text: Consider a simple check pointing protocol and the following set of operations in the log. 1. (Start, T4) 2. (Write, T4, Y, 2, 3) 3. (Start, T1) 4. (Commit, T4) 5. (Write, T1, Z, 5, 7) 6. (Checkpoint) 7. (Start, T2) 8. (Write, T2, X, 1, 9) 9. (Commit, T2) 10. (Start, T3) 11. (Write, T3, Z, 7, 2) If the database crashes immediately after writing the above log entry 11 and the system tries to recover using both undo and redo operations, what are the contents of the undo list (the list of transactions which need to undo) and the redo list (the list of transaction which need to redo) (a) Undo: T3, T1; Redo: T2, T4 (b) Undo: none; Redo: T2, T4, T3; T1 (c) Undo: T3, T1; Redo: T2 (d) Undo: T3, T1, T4; Redo: T2
